summary:
Here\'s my attempt at making Link from the Legend of Zelda.

Ideally, Link would be best a female character (so he could look youthful, almost like how Peter Pan can be played by a female), but, unfortunately, the green garments change when they\'re worn by a female.

This is the best I could do with a Wood Elf. Makes for nice photos, at least!
descriptionHtml:
Here\'s my attempt at making Link from the Legend of Zelda.

Ideally, Link would be best as a female character so he could look youthful (almost like how Peter Pan can be played by a female), but, unfortunately, the green garments change when they\'re worn by a female.

This is the best I could do with a Wood Elf. Makes for nice photos, at least!

VIDEO: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=07ZaqO05fIQ&hd=1
author: Syndicat3
